author: veithen
msg: Slightly changed the code for the optimization introduced by AXIOM-282 so that it interacts in a better way with the feature introduced by AXIOM-399. More precisely, a call to SOAPBody#hasFault() will now no longer expand an OMSourcedElement with unknown name present in the body.

author: jgrassel
msg: OPENJPA-2133: OpenJPA doesn't find custom mappings with an applicable class loader

author: raminder
msg: apply patch by Fernando Pinhati. Thanks for the contribution. Rave-599
